data.title: Artbook Spring 2024
data.meta_description: Artbook Spring 2024 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is the spring 2024 catalog for D.A.P., listing upcoming art books. It highlights several new publications including a book about a recently discovered Caravaggio painting, two books on photographer Gordon Parks, a book on artist Grace Wales Bonner's textile works, and a book of Jim Mangan's photographs. The catalog also features forthcoming publications on Joel Sternfeld's landscapes, Juergen Teller's fashion photography, Yayoi Kusama's infinity mirrors installations, and a monograph on Mickalene Thomas who creates vibrant, rhinestone-adorned paintings. The catalog provides titles, descriptions, prices and release dates for these and other upcoming art books.
